title.jp: Perfecting Breasts! / Dream Job / Panty Wars / Otosuna Mihari's Day Off

synopsis: Aito, a lowly manga artist trying to make his dreams come true, continually says and does things that make Ashisu, his unfortunate assistant, uncomfortable in every way imaginable.

title.jp: A New Assistant Arrives / That's Important / First Time Together

synopsis: A new girl shows up to assist Yuki, but there's something about her that might be a problem. Later, Yuki's editor tries to persuade him to alter his manga to rise in the rankings, and Ashisu recounts her first day on the job.

title.jp: Porno Mag Panic / Can I Take Care of Her? / Dark Comet Appears!

synopsis: Yuki's porno stash is discovered and the models look awfully familiar to Ashisu. When both of his assistants can't make it to work, Yuki's editor brings in a brilliant, yet cuddly cute, temp. assistant to help out.

title.jp: S&M / Mascot Character / Branya Appears! / Seventeen Mihari

synopsis: Aito angers Seno who takes her vengeance upon him. The group creates a new mascot that Ashisu falls in love with. Mihari recounts the first time she met Aito.

title.jp: Park Shock / Someday / Using Close Friends for Reference

synopsis: Aito, deppressed that his manga ranks dead last, meets an unusual fan int he park, Ashisu dreams of being a professional, and our favorite mangaka uses his friends as drawing references.

title.jp: Let's Go to a Hot Spring

synopsis: Aito decides to spend his royalty check on the girls, inviting them to a relaxing vacation to the hot springs. But as it always is with Aito, he has ulterior motives...

title.jp: Little Sister Attacks! / A Night Alone / Piggybacking the Super Assistant

synopsis: Ashisu's little sister visits, Aito's editor decides to spend the night, and the littlest super assistant lets Aito into her circle of trust.

title.jp: Chief Editor's Check / In the Mind of a Girl / Going Too Far

synopsis: The chief editor comes to check progress, Aito's dream of becoming the little girl (almost) comes true, and Mihari threatens to reassign Aito to another editor.
Mihari contemplates the small mistakes she may have made in her youth.

title.jp: Sena-Chan's Crisis / I'll Cheer You On! / Rain Talk

synopsis: Girls in bunny suits, long walks in the rain, and elevator problems are all in a day's work for Aito and his lovely assistants!

title.jp: Dreaded Change / Do your best, Sena-chan! / Know Yourself

synopsis: Mihari's altered appearance is incredibly distressing to Aito. Cat sitting becomes a bit of an adventure for Sena and Aito.

title.jp: Progress / End of Summer / Panty Personality Test

synopsis: Ashisu hopes to make her debut with a new author award. The end of the summer has the group analyzing their true nature through particular clothing choices.
